content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Broken Haft Your weapon's current Hit Points are reduced to its Broken Threshold. If already broken, the weapon takes 3d6 damage, ignoring Hardness. If your weapon is a reach weapon, it loses reach. Melee
All Thumbs Until healed, you are clumsy 1. Ranged
Whiff You hit yourself istead of the target. Unarmed
Draining Magic You are drained 1. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #50
